title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about SEGRD

what_is_segrd.a: SEGRD is a modular security, forensics, and incident response platform designed for regulated organizations.

who_is_it_for.a: SEGRD is built for small and medium SOCs, law firms and expert witnesses, regional banks, government agencies, MSSPs, and healthcare organizations.

byollm_explain.a: BYO-LLM (Bring Your Own LLM) means you can run your own AI model on your infrastructure. Your sensitive data never leaves your network.

data_privacy.a: Your evidence and case data are stored in your MinIO instance. On-premise and air-gapped deployments are also available.

compliance.q: What compliance standards does SEGRD support?
compliance.a: SEGRD is designed for HIPAA, SOX, PCI-DSS, GDPR, and FedRAMP requirements.

tools_included.a: SEGRD includes Sparrow, Hawk, YARA, Loki, Volatility, OSQuery, and more. All tools run in isolated containers.

pricing_model.a: SEGRD uses per-seat SaaS pricing with module-based add-ons. We offer Starter, Professional, and Enterprise tiers.

trial.a: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with access to core modules. No credit card required.
